mapper.select: select * from basket b join product p on b.product_no = p.product_no left join product_file f on p.product_no = f.product_no left join brand br on p.brand_no = br.brand_no where b.member_id = #{member_Id} and p.status='Y' order by basket_no desc
mapper.update: update basket set product_amount = #{productAmount} where basket_no = #{basketNo}
